mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eeg (`patient_number`, eeg_record, eeg_detail, eeg_type, have_sleep, apply_doctor, gather_date, create_date, creater, is_deleted ) VALUE (#{patientNumber}, #{eegRecord}, #{eegDetail}, #{eegType}, #{haveSleep}, #{applyDoctor}, #{gatherDate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{creater}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE eeg SET patient_number = #{patientNumber}, eeg_record = #{eegRecord}, eeg_detail = #{eegDetail}, eeg_type = #{eegType}, have_sleep = #{haveSleep}, apply_doctor = #{applyDoctor}, gather_date = #{gatherDate}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updater = #{updater} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.patient_number AS patientNumber, b.eeg_record AS eegRecord, b.eeg_detail AS eegDetail, b.eeg_type AS eegType, b.have_sleep AS haveSleep, b.apply_doctor AS applyDoctor, DATE_FORMAT(b.gather_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS gatherDate, b.is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM eeg b WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(0) AS cnt FROM eeg
AND eeg_detail LIKE '%' #{keyset} '%'

SELECT b.id, b.eeg_record AS eegRecord, b.eeg_detail AS eegDetail, b.eeg_type AS eegType, b.have_sleep AS haveSleep, b.apply_doctor AS applyDoctor, DATE_FORMAT(b.gather_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS gatherDate FROM eeg b WHERE patient_number = #{patientNumber}
